title: EURES Targeted Mobility Scheme – EU-Wide
description: A free EU‑funded service offering personalized job‑matching, CV & interview coaching, and relocation support to help you land a job and integrate smoothly across EU countries.

title: SEPE Integration Workshops – Spain
description: Spain’s SEPE offers in-person and online integrative workshops for jobseekers new to the EU; includes CV workshops, job fairs, and application assistance in Spanish & English.

title: Goethe TestDaF & Integration Support – Germany
description: Goethe-Institut’s professional German integration and TestDaF prep course helps healthcare, engineering and IT professionals clear language certification and integrate into German labor market.
